titleStmt.title: SII 7.863: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 863. (A.R. No. 236 of 1902). ON THE SOUTH, EAST AND NORTH WALLS OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
jaya jayaveṉṟu moḻi paṉṉiya vāymaiyiṟ paṇiyap poṉṉiyal vicumpariṟ katamum pacumpariveḷḷuḷai neṭuñcuvaṟ ṟeṭutta kuṟuntuṉaippaṭuṅka naḷḷuṟap poṉñāṇ vaḷḷuṟavaccat taṉikkā laracu maṉakkāṟ kaṅkuṟ kuḻampupaṭu periruṭ piḻampu paṭa vuruṭṭiya ceñcuṭar mauli veñcuṭar vāṉavaṉ vaḻimutal vanta mahipati vaḻimuta latipati narapati Aśvapati ṭa gajapati kaṭaliṭaṅ kāvalaṉ matimutal vaḻutiyar varaipuka maṟṟavar teviya raḻutuya raḻuṅkali laḻuṅkap poḻutiyal vañciyiṟ kāñci vakutta ceñcilaik kaliṅkaṉ kaṉae kap pā laṅkaṉ Ammai ṭ putumalar vākai puṉaintu notumalar kaṅkapāṭi kavvik koṅkam veḷippaṭuttaruḷi yaḷipaṭuttiruḷiya cāral malai yaṭṭuñ ceraṉ malaiñāṭṭut tāvaṭik kuvaṭṭiṉ pāvaṭic cuvaṭṭut tuṭarneyk kaṉakan tukaḷeḻa neṭunaṟ kopuraṅ kovai kulaiya māperum puricaivaṭṭam poṭipaṭap puricaic cutai kaviṉ paṭaitta cūḷikai māḷikai yutaikai muṉ ṉoḷḷeri koḷuvi Utaikaiventaik kaṭalpuka vekuṇṭu pontu cūḻamaṇṭalan toḻa vīḻamaṇṭalamuṅ koṇṭu taṇṭaruḷip paṇṭu taṅka ṭirukkulattor taṭavarai Eḻutiya poṅkupulip pottup putukkat tuṅkat tikkiṉiṟ ceṉai celutti mikkavoṟṟai veṇkuṭaikki ḻiraṭṭai veṇkavari teṟṟiya vaṉalan tivaḷa veṟṟiyuḷ vīṟṟiruntaruḷiya ventaṉ poṟṟirun taṇṭamiḻnāṭaṉ caṇṭaparākkiramaṉ ṟiṇṭiṟaṟ kaṇṭaṉ cempiyar perumāṉ centirumaṭantaimaṉ śrīrājarāja ṉintirasamāṉaṉ rājasarvvaññaṉeṉum puliyaip payanta poṉmāṉ kaliyaik karantu karavāk kārikai curantamulai mikappirintu muḻaṅkeri naṭuvaṇun talaimakaṟ piriyāt taiyyal nilaipeṟun tūṇṭā viḷakku
ci colliya laraicartam perumā ṉatula ṉemperumāṉ paraicai vaṇkaḷiṟṟup pūḻiyaṉ viraiceyu mātavit toṅkal maṇimuṭi vaḷavaṉ cuntaracoḻaṉ mantaratāraṉ ṟiruppuya muyaṅkun tevi viruppuṭaṉ vantutittaruḷiya malaiyar tirukkulattoraṉmaiyāka tamarakattoṉmaiyiṟ kulateyva koṇṭatu nalamikuṅ kavacan toṭutta kaviṉkoḷak katirnutit tuvacan toṭutta cutaimatiṟ cūḻakaḻp puḷakap putavak kaḷakak kopuravāyiṉ māṭamāḷikai vitit tecāntaṉmait teṉṟirukkovalū ricaran taṉṟakkavaṉṟatu micaraṅ kuṭakkuk kaluḻi kuṇakku kālpaḻuṅkak kāḷākaruvuṅ kamaḻ cantaṉamun tāḷār tiraḷccāḷamu niḷār kuṟiñciyuṅ kokuṭiyu mukaṭuyar kuṉṟiṟ paṟintuṭaṉ viḻap pāyntu ceṟintuyar putumatakiṭaṟip porkkaliṅkiṭantu motu motu mututirai vilaki katumeṉa vaṉkarai porutu varupuṉaṟ peṇṇait teṉkarai yuḷḷatu tirttat tuṟaiyatu moyvait tiyalu muttamiḻ nāṉmait teyvak kavitaic ceñcoṟ kapilaṉ murivaṇ ṭaṭakkaip pāri taṉṭaikkalappeṇṇai malaiyark kutavip peṇṇai yalaipuṉa laḻuvat tantarikṣañ cela miṉal pukum vicumpiṉ viṭupe ṟeṇṇik kaṉal pukuṅ kapilakkallatu puṉalvaḷar pereṭṭāṉa viraṭṭāṉa maṉaittiṉu maṉātiyāyatu niṉaippiṉu muṇartaṟ kariyatu yokika ḷuḷḷatu puṇartaṟ kiṉiyatu poykaik karaiyatu cantaṉa vaṉattatu caṇpakak kāṉatu nantaṉavaṉatti ṉaṭuvatu pantaṟ curumpaṭai veṇpūṅ karumpiṭai tuṇittarat tāṭ ṭoliyālaiyyalatu pāṭṭolik karuṅkaik kaṭaiyar peruṅkaik kaṭaivāḷ pacuntāṭṭiyuñ cenneṟ paḻaṉat tacumpār kaṇi
yavaṟṟai yarukka ṉariccaṉai muṟṟiya nāṉmaṟai terintu nūṉmuṟai yuṇarntāṅ karuccaṉāvitiyoṭu tericca vākamattoḻil muveṇ peyaruṭai muppurinūlor piriyāt taṉmaip peruntiru vuṭaiyatu pāṭakac ciṟaṭip paṇaimulaip pāvaiyar nāṭakat tuḻati naviṉṟatu ceṭakac caṇṭaiyuṅ kaṇṭaiyun tāḷamuṅ kāḷamuṅ koṇṭatir paṭakamuṅ kuḷiṟu mattaḷaṅkaḷuṅ karaṭikaittokutiyuṅ kaimmaṇip pakutiyu muruṭiyal timilai muḻakkamum maruṭaru vālvaḷait tuṇaiyu melvaḷait taṇaiyuṅ karuppoli mekamuṅ kaṭalumeṉak kañali tiruppoli tiruppali cinattu viruppolip pattartam pāṭal payiṉṟatu muttamiḻ nāvalaṟ nāṟkavi naviṉṟatu Evali laruṣaiyo ṭaraharaveṉak kuṉit taṭimaicey paruṣaiyar bahuvitam payiṉṟatu Aruṣai mukkaṇṇava ṉuṟaivatu kaṭavuḷar niṟaivatu maṇṇavar toḻuvatu vāṉavar makuḻvatu maṟṟu miṉṉa vaḷaṅkoḷ matiṟ patākaitteṟṟuṅ koḻuniḻaṟ civapurattāṟkup pannā ṇilaipeṟa munnā ḷuravoṉ ceytatāṉan tevaṉkuṭiyi lalakiyal marapi ṉamaintu Ulakiyal cāṇ panniraṇṭiṟ camainta taṉikkol poṟṟuṟa vaḷanta nūṟṟaṟupatu kuḻi māvoṉṟāka vanta veli yāṟe kāli lantaṅ kaḷaintu niṅkiya nilattā ṉiṅkā neṟṟukai Āṅkorumāviṟ kaṟukalamākak koḻunūṟ ṟavarāṭuṅ kūṭti yaḷanta Eḻunūṟ ṟirupati liṟaimakaṟ kurimai nāḻiyeṭṭāṉvāḻi yaṭṭāṉak karuṅkāloṉṟāṟ ceṅkaiyiraṇṭiṭṭaḷanta nellāṟṟupataṉiṟ kaḷainta nivantat taṉmai niṉaiyi luvantu nañcuṇṭavaruk kamutuṇa nayantavotteṇ vaḻuvāp patteṇ kuttal paḻanel larici paṉṉiru nāḻikku patiṉaiyiraṭṭi neṟ patiṉaiyiraṭṭiyuṅ kuṟuvāḷāṉa neṭuvā ṇayaṉik korirunāḻi yuḷppaṭut tuyarnta nel nāleṭṭāṉa nāḻiyum me
miḷaku muppiṭikku cellak kuṭutta nel laññāḻiyuñ cūḻ kaṟi tuvaṉṟa poḻkaṟkoḷ neṟ perukkiya nāluri yurikkiya naṟune yuḻakkarai taṉakku vaḻakkarai viṉavil munnāḻiyun tayir munnāḻik kāṅkaṟunāṉāḻiyu maṭaikkāyamitiṟkup panniruḻakkum paricāraka māṇaṉ ṉāṉkiṉukku nel laṟunāṉāḻiyun tirumaṭaippaḷḷip perumaṭaik kutavu mintaṉa voruvaṟkut tanta muṉṉāḻiyum Āka neṟ kalamu meka naṟṟivacam Appari ciyaṟṟali laṟuvakaiyirutuvu mippari ciyaṟṟi yeḻuntu nerāṉapiṉ putumalar virintu matumalar colaip puḷḷur kova luḷḷurp paḻanilam Iraṭṭu mukkāliṟ ṟanta patiṉaiñcu moṭṭuk kallaikkavar muṉṟu māvum Ālañceṟuvi lañcumāvum tiraṇṭu pāypuṉaṟ ṟeṅkācceṟuvi liraṇṭumāvum Iluppaikkā liraṇṭum nellālit teḻum pullālip puṟa mañcoṭuṅ kūṭṭi Ākiya nilattokai Apputtiraṇṭiyalmā muppattiraṇṭu melā ṟuṇarnta nālā ṟeṇpayi lantaṇa raṉaivarkku mariccaṉāpokan tantapiṉṉait taṭamalarp poykaip potakar paḻaṉap putumalarc colaic citāri pala mañcu mañcāmaṟ keṭṭa tiruvaiyyaṉ koṭṭamil kuṇattāṟ cempoṟ puricaic civapurattāṟkuk kova lantaṇarpāṟ koṇṭu koṭuttaṉa paṇṭaik kolāṟ paṇṭaik kuḻittokai maṇaṅkoṇ ṭiṇṭu muṇaṅkalpūṇṭi yopputtoṟu mā muppattaṟumāvu mikavantuyarpuṉaṟ pakavantakkaḻaṉi yeṭṭumuta lirupatumāvu maṭṭaviḻ pūttuḻāviya puṉal māttuḻāṉveli Ēviya veṭṭumāvum vāviyiṟ koṭeṟu paḻaṉak kāṭeṟu mānila mañcuṅ kaḷarnilam pattun neñcattuḷḷattakum puṉaluravukkaṭa lukāyampaḷat tiraṇṭum pāvaruṅ kaṇiyakkaḻaṉiyi leṭṭuṅ kaikalan turaippiṟ ṟuḻaṉi
kalameṉa meṟpaṭi kālāṟ pāṟpaṭa vaḷanta viṅkuṭaṉavar pāṅkuṭaṉ ṟokutta meññūṟṟuraikaiyil metaku tūne laññūṟṟirupat tirukalameṉa maṟṟait tokaiyil mativaḷar caṭaiyoṉ peṟṟa vāram piḻaiyaṟap pecilaimpatiṟṟaiñcoṭu moympuṟu patiṉoru kalattoṭu muṇaṅkalpūṇṭiyiṟ kaṟaiñel naṉcai ñikkip puṉcai nāṉamā māttāṟ kalavaraiyāṉa varaiyaṟai Aṟukala meṟṟip peṟukalavaḷavai muṉṟoṭu muppatu kuṟainta muṉṉūṟṟuk kalattiṉil maṟṟak kaṇṇutaṟkāka nilattava ruvanta nivantan nalattaku nāḷoṉṟiṉukku nāṉmuṉṉāḻi pāṉiṟat taṉmait tūniṟak kutta lariciyilāṉa nellu varicaiyiṟ kuṟupavaḷ kūli yeṟṟip peṟuvaṉa peṇiya paḻaneṟ ṟūṇiyuṅ kāṇiyavai yamitu pukaḻu neyyamutu muppiṭi koḷḷak koṭutta nellaṟunāḻiyum poḻutu muṉṟiṉukkiḻutupaṭu centayi roru muṉṉāḻik kirumuṉṉāḻiyu maṭaikkāya mutuk kāṟuriyattu mantaṇa ṉoruva ṉabhiṣekañ ceyyat tantaṉa kuṟuṇi muṟṟatainta nāṉāḻiyu maṟaiyaval cey māṇiraṇṭiṉukku kuṟaivaṟak kuṭutta neṟ kuṟuṇi ñāṉāḻiyu morāṇṭiṉukku nerāṇṭāka naṇṇiya nakṣattirameṉa nallo ṉaṇṇiya tiruviḷak keṇpatuṅ kaṇṇeṉak kāviyar kayalpaya lāviyūrataṉiṟ ṟikkuṭai yivaru mukkuṭaiyavartam Aṟappuṟamāṉa tiṟappaṭa nikkic cāli viḷaiñilam veliyākki mutalvatiṉ muṉṟe mukkā leyaraikkā litaṉ taṉivanta miyalvakai yuraippil Oppat tiruvaṉaiyavar muppattiruvar pāṭal payiṉṟa nāṭakamakaḷiṟkum neñcācāra niṟaivoṭu kuṟaiyāp pañcācāriyap pakutiyoṟkum naṟaipputumalarviri nantavāṉa miṟaipputtoḻil purinta viruntavattoṟkum yokiyoruvaṉukku niyokamuṭai nila
vāḻiyar ceñcaṭaikkaṭavuṭaṉ ṟiruvākkeḻvit tañcuṭaik kaṭikaiyaṉ ṟaṉakkum neñcil vititta muṟaimai matittu nokki yiṉṉavai piṟavu mirājarājaṉ ṟaṉṉavai muṉṉaṟ ṟattuvaneṟiyi laṟaṅkaḷ yāvaiyu miṟaṅkā vaṇṇam viññāpaṉattāl mikaveḷippaṭuttoṉ Aṉpatu veliyi laṭaikuṉṟakarkku moṉpatuveli yuṭaiya vuravoṉ komparnāṭuṅ kuḷirmalarccolai yamparnāṭaṉ Ālaṅkuṭikkoṉ teṇṭiraip paḻaṉat tiraimurnāṭaṉ vaṇṭirait tuyarpoḻil maṇaṟkuṭināṭaṉ neriya ṉarumoḻi nittaviṉotaṉ kāriyamallator kāriyaniṉaiyā tārāṇṭalaimaik kaṟpaka catucaṉa porāṇṭalaimaip puṇarpuyat turavoṉ kūttoḻil keḷā tettoḻil muṉainta kaṇṭakar karicaṟat turicaṟakkalicekamaṇṭalacuttiyil vayappuli vaḷarttoṉ vāṉpāl matiyum valampuri yiṭampuri yāṉpāl vatiyum viricaṭaikkaṭavuḷ neṟṟikkaṇṇum nilattavar niṉainta teṟṟikkaṇṇuñ cintāmaṇiyumpolap piṟanta pukaḻoṉ kolak karuṅkaḷiṟṟuḻavaṉ kampattaṭikaḷ mātiviṭaṅku varuparivalla litiviṭaṅkaṉ meṉkaruppālait talantarut taṇṭalait taṭanir nalantaru poṉṉināṭukiḻavoṉe . veliyarkoṉ vitiviṭaṅkaṉ viṟaṟ kampa ṉāliyalmāṉ coḻaṉatikāri kolap paṭiyiṉmeṟ poṟpūp paiṅkoval viraṭṭar muṭiyiṉmel vaiyttāṉ muyaṉṟu poṉmuk kaḻañcāl maṇippaṭṭam pūppuṉain=tu miṉmikka kaṭṭamain=tu meṟkaṭṭi coṉmikka kovalāṉ viraṭṭaṟ kin=tāṉ kulaveli kāvalāṉ vāḻ kampaṉ kaṇṭu . ceṉṉitiṟaṟ śrī rājarājaṟki yāṇṭu tikaḻu mirupatteḻiṟ ceḻunir veli maṉṉiya kampaṉ mahimālaiya muventaveḷāṉ viṇṇappattāl maṇiñirkkoval veṉṉiyal cīr viraṭṭatti liṅkamoṉṟu poṉ ṉūṟṟāṟ ce
ytataṟku veḷḷippiṭam paṉṉiya toṇṇūṟṟu muk=kaḻañcuṭai yampoṉ porttum Ayṅkaḻañciṉmeṟ pattumāve .
Digital edition of SII 7.863 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
